card.name: Hearthhull, the Worldseed
card.text: Station (Tap another creature you control: Put charge counters equal to its power on this Spacecraft. Station only as a sorcery. It's an artifact creature at 8+.) STATION 2+ {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn. STATION 8+ Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever you sacrifice a land, each opponent loses 2 life. 6/7

card.name: Inspirit, Flagship Vessel
card.text: Station (Tap another creature you control: Put charge counters equal to its power on this Spacecraft. Station only as a sorcery. It's an artifact creature at 8+.) STATION 1+ At the beginning of combat on your turn, put your choice of a +1/+1 counter or two charge counters on up to one other target artifact. STATION 8+ Flying Other artifacts you control have hexproof and indestructible. 5/5

card.name: Kilo, Apogee Mind
card.text: Haste Whenever Kilo becomes tapped, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Szarel, Genesis Shepherd
card.text: Flying You may play lands from your graveyard. Whenever you sacrifice another nontoken permanent during your turn, put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to Szarel's power on up to one other target creature.
